description: Defines a custom Flutter widget 'OceanButton', a minimal rounded button styled to match the Ocean theme, which encapsulates an ElevatedButton with optional icon and label.

classes.name: OceanButton
classes.description: A minimal, rounded button aligned with the Ocean theme, providing label, optional icon, and tap handling.

methods.name: OceanButton
methods.description: Constructor for OceanButton, requiring label and onPressed callback, optional icon.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the OceanButton, including optional icon and label within an ElevatedButton.
